resources.string: CWC Horoscope
Enter your birth date to discover your CWC Horoscope!
You are a Sonichu!
Strengths: Always ready to seek adventure, willing to do what\’s right, always zapping to the extreme
Weaknesses: On a constant search for Chaos emeralds, Abandonment issues

Since you’re a Sonichu, you have problems fitting in with society since you were abandoned by your parents because who wants to be related to a freak like you. In order to overcome your fears a constant need to find enchanted gems fulfills a emptiness in your life because you\’re a basic meta gamer.
You are a Rosechu!
Strengths: Heavy romantic interest in Sonichus
Weaknesses: Unhealthy obsession of Sonichus, very defensive about their gender

Rosechu will dedicate their lives to praise, please and infatuate any Sonichu they encounter. If someone questions their gender, they will often become very defensive. They\’ve been known to spend entire days stating they do not have the genitalia of the opposite sex. In your darkest moments you may feel as though you\'re being used to serve the needs of someone else, while not having your own personality or life. But then you quickly get over it because you have no other purpose in this world.
You are a Blachu!
Strengths: An intense need to be evil.
Weaknesses: Kidnapping Rosechus

Blachus will try to kidnap Rosechus to show their dominance to any nearby Sonichus. Although being the basic meta gamers they are, their severe insecurities hold them back from going all the way. When they’re not scheming their next shanghai, they will sometimes question why they’re evil. Some may want to have a simple life, settle down with a significant other and open that florist shop downtown that they’ve always dreamed of. However, these thoughts are for fools for once they choose the gamer life, there’s no going back.
You are a Magichan!
Strengths: Teleportation powers
Weaknesses: Questioning of one\’s sexuality

Magichans wield a great power of teleportation that can be used to transport any matter to any location, along as they know the exact spot it will be sent to. Some may be confused about their sexuality. This doesn’t help when these beings are unknowingly married to Christine Chan by birth.
You are a Asperchu!
Strengths: Kind hearted, Nice
Weaknesses: Easily taken advantage of by others

Asperchus see the world in a glass half full perspective with thoughts of kindness shared to those around them. One of their common downfalls is being taken advantage of by jerkops who are out to get basic casuals like yourself. Sonichus tend to not like them as they feel as though Asperchus are mocking Asperger Syndrome.
You are a Jerkop!
Strengths: Reasonable thinking, protectors of law and order
Weaknesses: Unreasonable hatred of Sonichu

When it comes to protecting those around you, knowing what’s right and wrong comes naturally. However, when they see a Sonichu all sense of understanding and explanations are thrown out the window as you have an unholy obsession of disagreeing with those types of people.
You are a Naitsirhc!
Strengths: Easy going person, very trusting
Weaknesses: Anxious

Seen as a villain by Sonichus, A Naitsirhc will often dress themselves in thought provoking attire. They’re often viewed as people from a rough side of town. Although, when someone gets to know you they will see your courteous and kind-hearted nature.
You are a Wes Iseli!
Strengths: Confident, Knows how to talk to women
Weaknesses: Ridiculous desire to cock block a Sonichu

Being the confident person they are, they will often have no problem talking to women in any circumstances. This mental train of thought changes when they see a Sonichu trying to gain the affection of a Roeschu. An average Wes Iseli, for whatever reason, will stop what they’re doing and prevent a Sonichu from achieving eternal happiness.
You are a Count Graduon!
Strengths: Cherishing old memories
Weaknesses: Refusal to accept change

Being someone who lives in the moment, Count Graduon will cling on to dear memories as a means to escape the harsh reality of life as nothing good lasts forever. When change arrives in the life of a Count Graduon, they will spiral in self-dread, wanting to go back in time to avoid having to grow up.
You are a Wild Sonichu!
Strengths: Energetic, Fun to be around
Weaknesses: Encouraging your children to commit murder

Most of the time you’re likely bringing cheer to your friends and family. Once in a blue moon and when your blood thirst rage for kill is energized, you will often advocate your children to take another person’s life.
You are a Slaweel Ryam!
Strengths: Powerful, All knowing
Weaknesses: Hatred of a Sonichu being happy

Being the divine ruler of PVCC, you will often sit on your throne delegating the day to day business. However, when signs of a Sonichu trying to pursue happiness appears in your kingdom, you will be obsessed with trying to tear down that Sonichu’s attempt to find love.
You are a Liquid Chris!
Strengths: Great impersonator, Confident
Weaknesses: Prone to being Autistic

These types tend to be great impersonators among social groups, tending to show their confidence to potential mates by voicing several animals of a certain continent. The only downside to being a Liquid Chris is that you are more likely to be Autistic, causing you to lose the ability to not find love. You’re usually despised by Sonichus by being better impersonators.
